Name: Hundred Chances - The Fortress
About the game: 30 Levels - Face 30 Levels filled with deadly traps and deadly enemies! Challenging Gameplay - With Gradually increasing difficulty as you progresses! 100 Opportunities - However you only have one Gameplay - Just like in the good old arcades! Solid Controls - Jump, Use your Fist to destroy the enemies, optimized controls for Gamepads and Keyboards! Nice Soundtrack - Your thumbs may hate you, but your ears will love you! Can you break through the Fortress and reach the top?
